evidence.text: Plaintiff C.M., now 29 years old, was 27 years old at the time of the forced separation described in this Complaint. She is the mother of Plaintiff B.M., now seven years old, who was five years old at the time of the separation.
Plaintiff B.M., now seven years old, who was five years old at the time of the separation.

Plaintiff L.G., now 24 years old, was 23 years old at the time of the forced separation described in this Complaint. She is the mother of Plaintiff B.G., now eight years old, who was seven years old at the time of the separation.
Plaintiff B.G., now eight years old, who was seven years old at the time of the separation.

Plaintiff M.R., now 35 years old, was 34 years old at the time of the forced separation described in this Complaint. She is the mother of Plaintiff J.R., now 14 years old, who was 12 years old at the time of the separation.
Plaintiff J.R., now 14 years old, who was 12 years old at the time of the separation.

Plaintiff O.A., now 26 years old, was 25 years old at the time of the forced separation described in this Complaint. She is the mother of Plaintiff L.A., now six years old, who was five years old at the time of the separation.
Plaintiff L.A., now six years old, who was five years old at the time of the separation.

Plaintiff V.C., now 24 years old, was 23 years old at the time of the forced separation described in this Complaint. She is the mother of Plaintiff G.A., now eight years old, who was six years old at the time of the separation.
Plaintiff G.A., now eight years old, who was six years old at the time of the separation.
Defendant United States of America is the appropriate defendant under the FTCA.
